QuestData.Title: Easy Pickings
QuestData.Description: The ambush launched smoothly. Most of the guards are dead, but a few are still pinned down with the wagons.$B$BGet in there and clear them out so we can push forward into the canyons.
QuestData.CompletionText: There are still some guards left down there. Clean them out.
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent. Now we can start pushing our ground forces up towards Grim Batol.
